html:
We remember the Philippines, Vietnam and the entire region hit by Typhoon Haiyan. Please be generous with prayers and concrete help.

— Pope Francis (@Pontifex) November 11, 2013

Please help the people of the Philippines. Call @decappeal Philippines telethon on 03706060610 between 4pm to 7pm #TyphoonAid

— Louis Tomlinson (@Louis_Tomlinson) November 18, 2013

Please help the people of the Philippines. Call @decappeal Philippines telethon on 03706060610 between 4pm to 7pm #TyphoonAid

— Niall Horan (@NiallOfficial) November 18, 2013

Help the people of the Philippines. Please call @decappeal Philippines telethon on 03706060610 between 4pm to 7pm #TyphoonAid

— Liam Payne (@Real_Liam_Payne) November 18, 2013

Want to help the people of the Philippines? You can call the @decappeal Philippines telethon on 03706060610 from 4-7pm. 1DHQ x #TyphoonAid

— One Direction (@onedirection) November 18, 2013

Tengamos presentes a Filipinas, Vietnam y la región afectada por el tifón Haiyan. Seamos solidarios con la oración y con la ayuda concreta.

— Papa Francisco (@Pontifex_es) November 12, 2013

Our thoughts are with those in the Philippines. Please help support typhoon #Haiyan relief http://t.co/WT2zSXSe4P x vb

— Victoria Beckham (@victoriabeckham) November 11, 2013

Help Unicef be there for children of the Philippines. Text UNICEF to 70123 to give £3. Thank you pic.twitter.com/1kPBMSjqu7

— Wayne Rooney (@WayneRooney) November 13, 2013

Help the Red Cross raise money for those that have been effected by Typhoon Haiyan in the Philippines and Vietnam! http://t.co/r67fzx45BO

— Finn Harries (@FinnHarries) November 13, 2013

Thinking of everyone devastated by Typhoon Haiyan in the Philippines!! Lets get donating please.. Help is needed!! http://t.co/eMqGJtEexZ

— Olly Murs (@ollyofficial) November 12, 2013

Nearly 4 million children in the Philippines have been affected by Typhoon Haiyan, help us help them: http://t.co/Kp5xDjdGLf

— Relief Effort (@Anitalia1973) November 15, 2013

Help Unicef be there for children of the Philippines. Text UNICEF to 70123 to give £3. Thank you pic.twitter.com/wrwrwnIqgz

— Jack Wilshere (@JackWilshere) November 13, 2013

Ricordiamo le Filippine, il Vietnam e l’intera regione colpita dal tifone Haiyan. Siate generosi nella preghiera e con l’aiuto concreto

— Papa Francesco (@Pontifex_it) November 11, 2013

Cómo ayudar a Filipinas http://t.co/7iuYdriZ2N Listado de organizaciones humanitarias con las que colaborar pic.twitter.com/o6hiBlqpPe

— Cadena SER (@La_SER) November 11, 2013

Make a change! Be Good! Help other People! #PleaseHelpThePHILIPPINES #PrayForThePhilippines

— God Almighty (@Godstagram) November 13, 2013

Lembremos as Filipinas, o Vietnam e toda a região atingida pelo furacão Haiyan. Sede generosos na oração e na ajuda concreta.

— Papa Francisco (@Pontifex_pt) November 12, 2013

Typhoon #Haiyan hit the Philippines one week ago. Remember you can help children affected by texting UNICEF to 70123 to give £3

— Tom Daley (@TomDaley1994) November 15, 2013

My thoughts are with everyone affected by Typhoon Haiyan in the Philippines. Let's help the survivors together. http://t.co/xeKf1g8Gqo

— Maria Sharapova (@MariaSharapova) November 12, 2013

This weekend I'm going to be donating all the x factor download song monies to the Philippines disaster fund, I hope it helps for the better

— Luke Friend (@LukeFriendMusic) November 15, 2013

Appeal by UK charities to help Philippines typhoon victims raises £13m a day after it was launched http://t.co/hulCkCfCcU

— BBC Breaking News (@BBCBreaking) November 13, 2013

4 millones de niños afectados por #Haiyan en #Filipinas. Ayuda a @unicef_es a salvar la vida de millones de niños http://t.co/zPnxGz1V2g

— David Villa (@Guaje7Villa) November 12, 2013

Philippines #TyphoonAid: 9.8 million people need urgent help. DONATE NOW. http://t.co/Xh81RaDKvK #Haiyan

— Keith Tomlinson (@iankeithtom) November 12, 2013

Todo mi corazón cn los afectados x el Tifón d Filipinas. No dudéis en ayudarles q lo necesitan. Os envío toda mi Fuerza! Estoy con vosotros!

— Abraham Mateo (@AbrahamMateoMus) November 12, 2013

¿Sabes que puedes ayudar a los niños afectados por el #tifónHaiyan en #Filipinas enviando un SMS con UNICEF al 28028? ¡Difunde! #Haiyan

— UNICEF ComitéEspañol (@unicef_es) November 11, 2013

The boys have launched a celebrity telethon via Twitter to help raise money for the Philippines!! pic.twitter.com/jVXv2WhCo3

— 1DAlert (@1DAlert) November 18, 2013

Retuitea para dar la voz de alarma por los niños de #Filipinas. 4,6 millones de niños afectados necesitan tu ayuda http://t.co/JHETX4FzoR

— UNICEF ComitéEspañol (@unicef_es) November 16, 2013

— The Guardian (@guardian) November 11, 2013

UN launches appeal for $301m (£188m) to help relief efforts in typhoon-hit areas of the Philippines http://t.co/zOSl67x89a #Haiyan #Yolanda

— BBC Breaking News (@BBCBreaking) November 12, 2013

Britain sending carrier HMS Illustrious to help victims of Philippines typhoon as UK government aid tops £20m http://t.co/50trcIJr6m

#mufc are supporting @UNICEF_UK's aid efforts in the Philippines. Find out how you can help, too: http://t.co/5KDvbhZ0Ou

This is the stock we are donating to #Philippines can a logistics company help us get them to Hearhrow? Please RT pic.twitter.com/HsUgUIP7JF

Please help the Philippines by RT-ing this article on the best ways to donate. Thank you so much! http://t.co/dRC2JmXhTi”

“@1DAlert: The boys have launched a celebrity telethon via Twitter to help raise money for the Philippines!! pic.twitter.com/Ip4YcHqjM2”

İnsanlar perişan haldeler. Yiyecek, içecek, yakıt, elektrik yok. #FilipinlerYardımBekliyor pic.twitter.com/XeP8M8hI2w

— Metin Yıkar (@myikar) November 13, 2013

Rappelons-nous les Philippines, le Vietnam et toute la région frappée par le typhon Haiyan. Soyez généreux dans la prière et l’aide concrète

— Pape François (@Pontifex_fr) November 12, 2013

View of typhoon-devestated Philippines: http://t.co/9GKh6VPCFi Here's how to help: http://t.co/c9UctpN4XM #Haiyan pic.twitter.com/nR8xyXwxhf

RT! Help #Philippines Red Cross @philredcross after #Typhoon #Haiyan DONATE: http://t.co/oOE3wP1muq TRACING PROGRAM: http://t.co/JQeycV2Bft

Thank you so much to all the countries that have been helping the Philippines! Thank you for helping us get through this... #unity #onelove

Please retweet. Wiggle have 8 pallets of clothing to donate to the #Philippines can any logistics companies help us get them to Heathrow?

Puedes ayudar a @UNICEF en #Filipinas enviando un SMS con la palabra UNICEF al 28028 o donando aquí https://t.co/4tqpYxwm7N

#HelpthePhilippines http://t.co/X3D062HC0y Retweet!!

Guys i'll be helping @decappeal Philippines telethon today at @bt_uk tower. Please call to donate from 4pm today on 03706060610 #typhoonAid
